StrapOn

Welcome to StrapOn for Jekyll.

I'm the template, layout (the default template).

I own the module pagenav and yield any page that is assigned to me in strapon.rb or has no layout assigned (after all, I am the default).

I'm a nav!

  • Nav item

  • Nav item
Hello world, I'm a module called summary. I'm just an aside tag, but I'm included in the page (index).

Hello world I'm the page index! I have a few modules that I own. One is standing here with me, introduce yourself, Summary.

Hey I'm the last thing on the page, but I'm not the least important. I may be below the fold, but I'm a lot of people use me to get around. Especially disabled people ;-)
